phrases: Do you intend to defy me to the bitter end?
It is been a lot of fun, but it is about time to bring this to an end, hot boy.
You think I would get sick ridin' on that?
That thing's so gigantic, it is clearly for transport!
I feel sick just lookin' at it!
I have had it up to here with your gooey crap!
Hot boy, Byro-sama negates his opponent's magic.
It is the first I have heard!
Wing Slash of the Fire Dragon!
His magic absorbs his opponent's magic and takes nourishment from it.
Gate of the Ram, I open thee!
I do not know how you did it, but you are totally tough to kill!
Gate of the Golden Bull, I open thee!
after protecting a beautiful girl from falling off a cliff!
I am not going to bother gettin' ticked off at you, just get her!
I will battle mooore fiercely than ever!
No way am I going to lose to some cow!
He is not under her control?!
As I suspected, she can only control humans!
That magic does not work against Celestial Spirits!
This girl's got a nice body, too!
What the hell are you responding to?!
I am sorta reluctant to attack a nice body...
Lucy-neesan, your Celestial Spirits are all kind of...
How can I put it... Unique...?
I can count on them... but their characters are just...
This is no time to be talking about that!
His character comes on strong, too...
I do not think there is anything we can do when she is moving that fast!
I have to take her down...
Even though she is the spitting image, that is not the Coco I knew in Edolas.
So you are the one who is giving off an enormous amount of magic power...
Your reputation precedes you, Fairy Tail's most powerful S Class Wizard...
I do not know who you are... but it looks like you have come to attack Fairy Tail.
I have no business with your guild.
This will be my biggest scoop in the history of the Weekly Sorcerer!
His Light and Dark Side, this coool situation comes up!
First a showdown after seven long years and now this... it is too delicious!
Which do you want me to beat down first?
I will proceed until you are eliminated.
You talk elimination or whatever, and yet you are on the defensive?
Speaking precisely, I nullified your magic against me and it discharged behind me.
You mean the nullified magic passed through you,
then charged up again and had an effect on the trees, right?!
To be honest, I do not have time to face off against you like this.
We have a mission to carry out.
I am going to go with a heavy hitter!
The more you fight it, the more magic it absorbs and the bigger it gets!
Are not no way I am going to lose against this blob!
Iron Fist of the Fire Dragon!
It does not only absorb power,
it can take on the properties of what it is absorbed!
That is because the more magic it absorbs from the enemy,
Do you get it, pretty blue cat?
My hound dog is truly the best!
I would like you to step aside.
You should clear the way by force.
Until you are out of my way then...
Y'know, you are a pain in the ass...
I could say the same about you.
So what are you after, anyway?
Why are you givin' our guild so much grief?
Unlike that Kain guy's controlling magic, she does not need to use hair...
But she can only control one person at a time,
and the effect probably only works within a set distance...
If I move far enough away, she probably will not be able to control me,
That girl's always on the move!
Shall I put you out of your misery, hot boy?
What do you have in mind?
You can run, but you cannot hide, boy and cat!
If I do that, it will absorb your magic again...
I am sick an' tired of your slimy ass!
I would say that is the very definition of reckless...
What are you trying to do, Natsu?
My hound dog got a blowout from eating too much?!
Well, now what are you going to do?!
If this absorbs your ridiculous amount of power, we will both blow up, hot boy!
This is happening because of your damn putty!
In that case, I will use my hound dog's increased power to just protect my fist!
I will make your arm half-cooked!
Not if I have anything to say about it!
There is no end to this...
He belongs to the Legion Corps!
Zentopia has followers all over Fiore, not to mention all over the world!
And the Legion Corps is a secret order of warriors
from the dark side of their history!
Apparently, it is comprised of fierce soldiers
who have been through training so harsh that not even a priest could endure it!
And what does this secret order want with Fairy Tail?
There is no need to tell you that.
Tail is not a guild that can be crushed so easily!
That is why I am not all that worried, to be frank.
However, we only have business with Lucy Heartfilia.
Your eyes tell me how serious you are.
The Archbishop of Zentopia has entrusted us with this...
It is very important that this crusade be carried out.
There is no point in being a field reporter if you die on the scene.
Y'know, this has taken more time than I thought it would.
But that is because we did not have any information about what you looked like...
To be precise, it is not Lucy Heartfilia herself that we want.
What we are looking for is...
Before that, why do not you let go of my hand?
I am not interested in holding hands with a man
and I hate both sweetness and obstinacy!
It is not like I am holdin' your hand because I want to!
Then the only thing for it is to crush you until we get separated, hot boy.
I thought my arm was going to snap off!
Is that what you say when someone saves your ass?
And now we have got ice boy...
Do not call me any weird names!
What the hell are you doing here?!
He is the Sugar Boy of Earthland!
It looks like you are having a hard time.
I cannot seem to get the better of this guy...
There is nothing more unpleasant than coming back home
and finding the place overrun with scum!
Did you really think we wanted you?!
My father left me this keepsake!
I will not give it up!
Then I want it even more!
I love stealing things that are precious to people!
It seems the clock hand has been obtained.
This are not going to end with Fairy Tail gettin' trounced!
I guess they were not after Lucy after all, but that clock hand, huh?
I wonder why they want that thing...
It is obvious, are not it?
I bet those jackasses are clock geeks!
Mmm, I do not think you are on the right track there...
Next time: Key of the Starry Sky!
So the big hand and little hand form a golden triangle...
